blog:item.title: New DeeEnEs version 2.3.29
blog:item.blog:content: Uploaded a new version of DeeEnEs (2.3.29) and put a message on the home page asking people to upgrade because the home-made "DDOS attack" on the server was really getting out of hand (several Gigs worth of data in only 10 minutes!). The exact reason is not known and I'm not going to try to figure it out anymore. In a few days this site will only be reachable by the URL www.palacio-cristal.com while the old URL palacio-cristal.com will cease to work thereby cutting off all traffic generated by those old clients that are bringing the server to its knees. The new DeeEnEs client uses a new mechanism which will make it easier for me to control the traffic in the future.
